evidence.claim: Alpha II utilizes AWS services such as Lambda and RDS for cloud-based applications.
The company has a focus on HIPAA compliance and supports various X12 EDI transaction sets such as 835 and 837.
Integration of FHIR and HL7 to facilitate interoperability in healthcare data exchange is highlighted in their engineering documentation.

icp.icp_reason: Alpha II handles X12 transactions and emphasizes integration, fitting ICP profile.
